蟲.definition: lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures; CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]; (fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

蟲子.definition: insect; bug; worm; CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]

蟲災.definition: insect damage; destruction of crops by pest insects

蟲牙.definition: tooth decay; dental caries; decayed tooth; rotten tooth

蟲白蠟.definition: white wax from Chinese white wax bug (Ericerus pela)

蟲草.definition: see 冬蟲夏草|冬虫夏草[dong1chong2-xia4cao3]

蟲蠟.definition: white wax from Chinese white wax bug (Ericerus pela)

蟲豸.definition: insect or insect-like small creature (literary); base person (used as a curse word)
